articles.description: As Pep Guardiola and Manchester City's current crisis continues, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague takes a look at their issues - and potential solutions.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: 'Self-doubt, errors and big changes - inside crisis at Man City'

articles.description: India will face Pakistan in Dubai on 23 February as the International Cricket Council releases the Champions Trophy 2025 fixtures.
articles.title: ICC Champions Trophy 2025: India face Pakistan in Dubai as fixtures released

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim questions the "choices" of people close to forward Marcus Rashford after he said he was ready for a "new challenge".
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Man Utd boss Ruben Amorim questions 'choices' of people surrounding forward

articles.description: Opener Sam Konstas is set to become Australia men's youngest Test batting debutant in 71 years in the Boxing Day Test against India.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Sam Konstas, 19, to make debut for hosts in Boxing Day Test

articles.description: A new documentary explores the genius of Sir Alex Ferguson and looks at his greatest achievements in the game.
articles.title: How Sir Alex Ferguson built his last great Manchester United side

articles.description: La Liga strugglers Valencia appoint West Bromwich Albion boss Carlos Corberan as their new head coach.
articles.title: Carlos Corberan: Valencia appoint West Bromwich Albion head coach

articles.description: The retirement of long-time talisman Andy Murray this year gave an opportunity for other British players to step into the limelight - and here's who impressed.
articles.title: How Jack Draper, Katie Boulter, Henry Patten & Alfie Hewett led British success in 2024

articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid is ejected from their 111-106 win against the San Antonio Spurs after confronting a referee.
articles.title: Joel Embiid: Philadelphia 76ers star ejected after confronting referee Jenna Schroeder

articles.description: Former champion Rob Cross is knocked out of the 2025 World Darts Championships as a record number of seeds fall in the second round at Alexandra Palace.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Rob Cross knocked out as record number of seeds fall

articles.description: The Green Bay Packers earn a dominant 34-0 win over the New Orleans Saints to secure their spot in the NFL play-offs.
articles.title: NFL: Green Bay Packers rout New Orelans Saints to secure play-off spot
